title: Windows 11 will soon warn users if their PC is unsupported
content:
Users running Windows 11 on unsupported hardware may soon see a warning, based on the latest build released to Insiders in the Dev channel. When opening the Settings app, Windows 11 will let users know if their PC doesn’t meet the minimum requirements to run the OS. However, it won’t stop users from running the

The post Windows 11 will soon warn users if their PC is unsupported appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Windows 11 is now showing a warning on PCs with unsupported hardware, letting them know the minimum requirements aren't met.
